Package provided.jxMaps.utils.impl

Class DistanceLogicalHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • provided.jxMaps.utils.impl.DistanceLogicalHost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILogicalHost
    public class DistanceLogicalHost
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILogicalHost
    An ILogicalHost that is true when the great circle distance between two entities is less than a boundary value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DistanceLogicalHost​(java.util.function.Supplier<com.teamdev.jxmaps.LatLng> getAFn, java.util.function.Supplier<com.teamdev.jxmaps.LatLng> getBFn, double earthRadius, double boundaryRadius)
      Create an instance of the class with the given parameters.

      Call the appropriate case on the given visitor corresponding to the current state of the host.
      ILogicalVisitor<java.lang.Void,​com.teamdev.jxmaps.Map> makeLogicalVisitor​(IDistanceCases cases)
      Factory for an ILogicalVisitor that closes over this host and thus can supply both the map and distance values to the given IDistanceCases object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistanceLogicalHost

        public DistanceLogicalHost​(java.util.function.Supplier<com.teamdev.jxmaps.LatLng> getAFn,
                           java.util.function.Supplier<com.teamdev.jxmaps.LatLng> getBFn,
                           double earthRadius,
                           double boundaryRadius)
        Create an instance of the class with the given parameters. The LatLng suppliers are called when the execute method of this host is called so as to get the most up-to-date position data from each entity.
        Parameters:
        getAFn - One supplier of a LatLng value, representing the first entity
        getBFn - Another supplier of a LatLng value, representing the second entity
        earthRadius - The Earth's average radius in the same units as the boundary radius.
        boundaryRadius - The boundary radius where if the distance between the two entities is less than this value, this host is in a true state.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public <R,​P> R execute​(ILogicalVisitor<R,​P> vis,
                             P param)
        Description copied from interface: ILogicalHost
        Call the appropriate case on the given visitor corresponding to the current state of the host.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface ILogicalHost
        Type Parameters:
        R - The return type of the visitor
        P - The input parameter type of the visitor
        Parameters:
        vis - The visitor to accept which has true and false cases.
        param - The input parameter to pass to the visitor's case that is called.
        Returns:
        The result from running the case of the visitor

      • makeLogicalVisitor

        public ILogicalVisitor<java.lang.Void,​com.teamdev.jxmaps.Map> makeLogicalVisitor​(IDistanceCases cases)
        Factory for an ILogicalVisitor that closes over this host and thus can supply both the map and distance values to the given IDistanceCases object. The returned ILogicalVisitor must be used with this DistanceLogicalHost instance because it tied to it.
        Parameters:
        cases - An IDistanceCases class that provides case methods
        Returns:
        An ILogicalVisitor that closes over this DistanceLogicalHost
